alert.note: Alert for Barton (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 17 at 7:21PM CDT until September 18 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN RICE...SOUTHWESTERN ELLSWORTH AND SOUTHEASTERN BARTON COUNTIES... At 721 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Claflin, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ellinwood, Claflin, Chase, Holyrood, Bushton, Cheyenne Bottoms, Silica and Odin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
